Managerial Economics

Authors B E Rockett
Year 1968
Origin United Kingdom
Tagged non-fiction economics Penguin Penguin Modern Economics Univers
Type book cover
Reference RS.010.0140

About

The arrows pattern was actually used for all the covers in the Penguin Modern Economics series.
